text: Beautiful and clean mosque. Air-conditioned. Limited pararell parking for cars and the larger open carpark up ahead. Plenty of snacks and eateries along the shop houses leading to the mosque. Bike lots are also limited to around the area. Do park somewhere and walk as every step to the mosque brings good blessings to oneself.

The nearest mosque from the hotel we are staying at. The call to prayer is only from inside the mosque. So you need to come before prayer time. The surrounding residents are friendly. My daughter was given pocket money when she was going home from the mosque.
Not far away from joo chiat road, can reach within walking distance, lot of halal food stall around with afordable price, even they have water refill in front of the mosque, very convenient

Friday(Juma) prayers have two sessions. So,if you are late,you can join the second session. Airconditioned inside and has upper floor too. If you happened to be here in Ramadan, they provide light iftar. It is by the main road and easy to find.
Super clean and comfort Masjid in Joo Chiat. Wudhu place is nicely designed. Convenient for all Muslim seeking to perform prayer while in Singapore.
